text:
Splurged for breakfast! Ordered this in via Grabfood because their croffles looked so good and they also offered a variety of drinks. There were so many options I had a hard time narrowing it down to two. In the end, I went with Banana Caramel Crumble and Nutella Marshmallows.

The croffles were priced at about $5 each. They were smaller than expected and rather soft. Would have been nicer if they were more crisp and flaky. That said, I loved the toppings and they matched up well with the iced chocolate. I do think I will try more flavours down the road.

By the way, it’s a home-based business, open 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. Also, they don’t use pork or lard.
small portion didnt expect and the mouthfeel of the matcha is horrible very sandy and grainey the powder sinks whihc is not suppose to happen, 1st rime drinking from here not good
it's too small it's like a mini croissant, it's the size of my plam. i'm very not satisfied with me paying $20 grab for a devastating result from this shop.

Only available for pick up. It’s a home base business. Supporting for this indie alternative coffee!
Drinks are gooooddd!!
